events.message: I received the wrong item in my order, and I would like to request a refund because this is not what I purchased.
The issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer's report of receiving the wrong item.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah to handle the refund request as soon as possible.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order and I'm here to help you obtain a refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund promptly?
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered to me.
We have verified the issue and initiated a full refund to your original payment method. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and refund process. I appreciate your help and prompt solution to my problem.
The refund case has been marked as resolved following confirmation from the customer that the refund was received and satisfactory.
We are following up to ensure everything is fine after the refund was processed and to check if you need any further assistance.
As no further issues were reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you to rate the service experience regarding your recent refund case.
